MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL57 postcode area of Bethesda affecting properties in Coetmor Road and surrounding area. This is causing flickering and reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:25AM. Our engineers have arrived in the area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9:35AM 12th February 2021
